metadata.title: About Gorgo - Join the Medusa open-source community
metadata.description: Join Gorgo and help build the largest open-source ecommerce platform in the world

AboutPage.description1: We believe e-commerce developers deserve a better DX, and businesses should move beyond legacy and proprietary solutions. Medusa opens a new path to flexible, modern commerce — and at Gorgo, we make that path simpler and more accessible.
AboutPage.contactTelegram: – join the dev community on Telegram
